location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 tracing paper sheetDimensions: 336mm x 210mmFoliation: The map sheet has a foliation number in the top right hand corner of the folio. The number is enclosed by a circle.

mods.abstract: Tracing paper map affixed to a page of minute paper showing the proposed concession area which Petroleum Concessions Limited hope to acquire from the Shaikh of Bahrain.The areas which the Company hope to acquire are marked with red dotted lines and the principal islands within each area are named.Longitude and Latitude lines are marked on the map.
